room_title: Escape room "Bank Heist" by Escape 605 in Sioux Falls
room_address: 3718 S Westport Ave, Sioux Falls, SD 57106
room_description:
You are a member of a successful crime syndicate, and your specialty has always been safecracking. Today, you will be facing your greatest challenge yet, as you and your team attempt a heist at the Valley Isle Bank.
Your recon team has just completed phase one of the heist – they have ensured the building is empty and gained access to the bank manager’s office, where the door to the vault awaits. They have assessed the situation and have reported that this particular vault is going to be difficult to compromise.
If you do manage to enter the vault, you will have to make a crucial decision: take the available money and run or stay just a little longer to try to significantly increase your take!
